entry.title: shreyansh424singh: Basic-Decimal-Integer-Machine
entry.content: Made an interpreter for a toy language in SML which allows basic arithmetic operations and input-output.

entry.title: shreyansh424singh: VMC-Machine-for-While-Language
entry.content: Used ML-Lex to convert program into tokens then it was parsed using ML-Yacc to give an AST (Abstract Syntax Tree). Then the AST was executed using Value Stack, Control Stack and Memory Array using SML language

entry.title: kosinw: tiger
entry.content: Modern Compiler Implementation in ML, in F#.
